art.author: lynn
art.post: Hi everyone, Heaven is for Real was just highly recommended to me.  I am going to read it tomorrow.  I have read many of your testimonies and find them comforting. We cannot know what happens specifically at death until we’re there and to catch a glimpse from you that have tasted it is amazing to say the least.  Thank you for sharing your stories, you give me hope and peace.
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
